title: [GAMEPLAY]Snow Day Ziggs, Everything is invisible
body:
Wile playing Ziggs, sometimes every ability, auto attack besides his Short Fuse becomes invisible, till it hits the ground.
The Bouncing Bombs ground effect would show up but the ball itself was gone (the little patch of snow were it bounces off of)
I only use Snow Day Ziggs so i don't know if its just the skin.
It also seems to only effect one person a game. It's also not every game (4/7 games since we first had the problem)
Once happening to me, three times to the people I was playing with.
The time it happened to me, it started around the 25 minute mark.
Was wave clearing mid, one bouncing bomb was visible.
The next wasn't and after that everything became invisible.
Started March 21st.
Haven't had the issue before then (and I've played a lot of Snow Day Ziggs this patch/season)

replies.body:
Hey Amagee - 

Thanks for the report! 

We've seen this issue before, but we're not able to pinpoint the exact cause here. Would you mind providing your specs - we think it may potentially be related to particular graphics settings / graphic cards. 

You can grab a dxdiag by doing the following - 

1. Press [Windows Key] 
2. Type dxdiag in the search bar and hit 'Ok'
3. The DirectX Diagnostic Tool will open. Press the "Save All Information..." button.
4. Choose where to save the file (for example, your desktop).
5. Attach the DxDiag to your response on the forums

If you have questions about how to grab them, feel free to ask me! :D 

Thank youuuu!

Saw this issue just last match.  Everyone that replied in the chat and my friends total up to at least 5 people that all saw it at the same time.  At least between me and my friends, I know there's an Intel integrated graphics on Windows 10 and myself on a desktop with Windows 7 and an NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti.  They were visible for some portion of the match, but then became invisible for the remainder.
the difference was it was multiple people in the game that couldn't see it
ive never had a problem before but I saw this today exactly riot is it the same problem or is it something else now
even though this was posted about a year ago these exact same things happened to me yesterday i would reconsider looking into this
ill keep an eye on it, I like to play ziggs as well also with that skin so, just sayin you have another, with you in this

I did an AI match and it happened to me the first try. 8:45 into it. I hit 3 with a Q at the same time but Sivir blocked it with her spellshield and I was graphically glitched out after that. my computer lagged for maybe a second, when it happened. 

I don't know if this is game mode specific but I have played Ziggs several times in ARAM with no issue
